query:
select
            id,
            calories,
            protein protein_grams,
            carbohydrates carbohydrates_grams,
            fat fat_grams,
            name food_name,
            eaten_at
        from food
        where eaten_at at time zone $1 > (
            case when exists (
                select 1 from balancing_checkpoint where user_id = $2
            )
            then (
                select ignore_before
                from balancing_checkpoint
                where user_id = $2
                order by ignore_before desc
                limit 1
            ) else date('01-01-0')
            end
        )
        and user_id = $2
        order by eaten_at
